Name: Nothing Phone (1)
build: Glass front (Gorilla Glass 5), glass back (Gorilla Glass 5), aluminum frame
bodyother: Multiple LED lights on the back (notifications, charging progress, camera fill light)Blinking red light on the back (video recording indicator)IP53 - splash, water and dust resistant
os: Android 12, upgradable to Android 13, Nothing OS 1.5.2
cpu: Octa-core (1x2.5 GHz Cortex-A78 & 3x2.4 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4x1.9 GHz Cortex-A55)
sensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, proximity, gyro, compass
